website_summaries.verdict: Color-coded pairs help you find the weights you want in record time.
pros: Designed for low bounce and high durability
cons: Offered in both single and paired shipments, so read carefully when selecting

customer_reviews.title: Very good for garage gym!
customer_reviews.text: Great plates for a garage gym. They are a lot more durable than the soft bumper plates I've purchased from sports authority. I have a 45 pound and a 35 pound pair and I drop them from overhead all the time onto my cement garage floor and they are no worse for the wear. Also, they do not bounce when they strike the floor, which is a pretty big deal when you're working out in confined spaces. Will definitely be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Reading junkie

customer_reviews.title: Plate warping.
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months in a hot garage the 10 lb. plates warped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability may be an issue?
customer_reviews.text: These plates were nice out of the box. After only a few months they don’t seem very durable. The material is breaking away from the bushings and the plates are warping. I will keep updating as time goes on if they are holding up or continuing to fail.
customer_reviews.author: fred_flintstone

customer_reviews.title: These look great. They are high quality and smelly (kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper options that are kind of a no-brainer (you can get the same weights in black for a bit cheaper), you basically pay a bit more for the aesthetic, which I shamelessly did. These look great. They are high quality and smelly (kind of a rubbery/putrid smell, noticeable bot not terribly strong.) Of course when the smell fades off then there are no problems I can think of. Great weights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at the right price
customer_reviews.text: Simply perfect. After pricing against other bumper plates, I order the 45 lb red and the pink 35 lb and pair of 25's. They are of the highest quality and add a bit of color to my home gym. Seem to be very well made. No rubber smell. Slide easily onto olympic bar when loading and unloading. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lighter weight deadlifting
customer_reviews.text: Bought these so my wife and I could deadlift without heavy weights on the bar and still have the bar at the proper height. Work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: The plate does not fit on a standard olympic barbell
customer_reviews.text: The bore hole in the plates are not large enough to fit on a standard olympic barbell, I purchased a set of 15 pound plates from the same company and while they are also extremely tight, they also fit enough to use. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: tacobacci

customer_reviews.title: These are great plates. Minimal bounce
customer_reviews.text: These are great plates. Minimal bounce, vibrant colors. I have been using them daily for about 2 weeks, I have 45, 35, 15, and 10. They're a good price for a good product. They compete in quality with the more expensive Rogue product. Perfect for my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great weights!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these weights. I use them on my concrete floor in my basement. These are better than the solid steel plates as they do not clank or damage my floor. The colored plates make it easy to easily identify weights.
customer_reviews.author: KfillyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Pick these bad boys up.
customer_reviews.text: They weigh as much as they are supposed to. They don’t smell bad or leave greasy stains like some weights do. They are pretty thick but nothing too crazy. Definitely will get some more plates down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCarroll

customer_reviews.title: These things are heavy!!
customer_reviews.text: They looked a LOT lighter in the photos. I mean yeah they have taken a beating and have held up really well and will continue to add more of them to the collection but you would think with modern technology they could make these out of lighter materials and easier to lift.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Keeps its original shape
customer_reviews.text: Great product have over a year now and it has not lost its shape even with 1000 lb capacity barbell set up For long period of time! Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Liz1

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these to add some color to my weights ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to add some color to my weights, but ended up getting the black ones shipped. The smell and oil(?) is still there after multiple uses but they're stored in the garage so not a big issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Carter

customer_reviews.title: Lift heavy stuff
customer_reviews.text: The product is very well constructed and properly weighted. They have been dropped with no issues to date. I expect to add a few more plates soon.
customer_reviews.author: bryan6and7

customer_reviews.title: Just want I expected, a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking plates! Good quality for the price, got them fast, at was concern about the smell at first when I read the comments; but when I got them, it wasn’t bad at all, Overall a great buy, recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for My Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these bumper plates. I looked for the right bumper plates for weeks and glad I settled on these!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: They look great
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on them and what is working out w/o the aesthetics. Bumper weights are a big expense and these look and work really well. They're a great addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the ones at chain gyms
customer_reviews.text: I got these to outfit my home gym since the number of free weights are limited at my big box chain gym. These are great, and have a nice solid feel (better than the ones at the gym), and they have minimal bounce and roll, even when dropped from overhead.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Young

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: These puppies are sweeeeet! We’re a CrossFit family and these were the perfect addition to our garage.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Hall

customer_reviews.title: Similar cost to cheaper versions
customer_reviews.text: They are a little bit more pricey than some of the others but i really liked the color of them. They were also not as thick as some of the other bumper plates on the market so I could potentially get them to pile onto a barbell and be able to use all the weight that i ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Chance W.

customer_reviews.title: Green tens easy to locate
customer_reviews.text: Well made, I like the color difference it makes it easy to fine the tens.
customer_reviews.author: william gatherwright

customer_reviews.title: Good bumper plates for home gym
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here - it's a bumper plate, it does its job, and doesn't mind being dropped. I've used it for a few months now and have no complaints. I don't see the need to splurge on name-brand bumpers; if you don't either, then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I brought mines used on amazon so i got them For way less then they worth.
customer_reviews.author: gene

customer_reviews.title: Great weights, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of 25lb and a set of 10lb weights and they are high quality. They do exactly what I need them to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica File

customer_reviews.title: These will last nearly forever,
customer_reviews.text: These will last nearly forever, just clean the steel center once in a while and make sure not to stab or chip the plastic/rubber material
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed, also I was very surprised how sturdy the 15# plates have preformed, no warping at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Cruz

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these around a month ago and they have been great tools. I drop them on the concrete all the time and they have been a real pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: We've had these in our garage gym and they are holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Psych Associates

customer_reviews.title: Good plate. Mild rubber smell.
customer_reviews.text: They weigh what they say and they can handle impact very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fit Olympic bars
customer_reviews.text: Plates DO NOT fit on standard Olympic bar, so they work great holding down the gym mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I use these as normal weights in my bench. My other weights had stated to rust excessively and these won’t.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: as advertised. a little pricey, local stores may have a better deal for you
customer_reviews.author: M.D.F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for powerlifts/crossfit type workouts
customer_reviews.text: The weight is accurate, I used two different scales. They are heavy duty. Perfect for powerlifts/crossfit type workouts.
customer_reviews.author: GunPilot

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these weights! I have them in my finished basement and the rubber smell is not nearly as bad as people have complained.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great. Haven't noticed any bending at 95 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the black 15's. No smell or grease like other reviews. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: ashley williamson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice weights
customer_reviews.text: Very cool to have these on my bar. They work well, but the sleeves are a little large, and a bit loose on the bar
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great weights that are high quality and what i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wow these are so nice and well made i will get some more of them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: They meet my fitness needs and live up to its fullest potential. They are extremely durable and I love how it’s rubber and not cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: EKS

customer_reviews.title: They don't fit
customer_reviews.text: The 45lb plates didn't fit on a standard 2" barbell
customer_reviews.author: Berenice Milgrom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I recently left my position as a trainer for the YMCA. My husband added a workout room at home for me. These are perfect for it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great for deadlifts
customer_reviews.text: If you can't do the full weight rack, this is a good way to get there
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Plates don’t fit with standard Olympic barbell
customer_reviews.text: Neither of the plates fit my standard Olympic barbell. I have other weights that do fit it so it’s frustrating that these don’t work!
customer_reviews.author: caitlin chrisman

customer_reviews.title: great plate idea
customer_reviews.text: great plate idea! the 15lb plates are both economical and very strong! don't bend under their own weight like other brands of 10 and 15lb bumpers
customer_reviews.author: Asher Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Weighs 45lbs
customer_reviews.text: Weighed right on but I ordered one by accident and it came black. When I ordered the second it came red. All others match.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome plates!
customer_reviews.text: These plates are nice! I've had these for about 2 months now and I'm digging them.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pascual

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take out of the box and assemble. Super clean and nice scent. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, but wasn't brand new as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Good item, mine wasn't new as described though. Had obvious wear and tear. Seemed like a previously returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Ferris Bueller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my garage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! I will definitely be ordering some more. Good quality, fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Very nice quality and are holding up great to abuse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Weights are very nice. They are wide 3 inches. They have a rubber smell. Going to order more.
customer_reviews.author: seals

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: These plates were exactly what I was expecting. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DnD

customer_reviews.title: just buy them already
customer_reviews.text: great plates for the price! make sure you take care of them, as they will get scratched quite easily. Color is solid, bounce is great, the hole is perfect, what more could you ask for. You came to the right place.
customer_reviews.author: Climber NY

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great shipping
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars well earned for X Training. Good quality, great shipping. Just well executed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Self

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I plan to buy more if needed they work great for my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob A. Venhrost

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They came as expected, had them for a couple of months ,great plates buy them
customer_reviews.author: anthony norman

customer_reviews.title: Great plates for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great plates for the price. We use these for Crossfit and they are fantastic. Much cheaper than Rogue plates with almost the same quality. Low bounce and indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for home gym. I use them in the garage with some rubber mats.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B.

customer_reviews.title: Lifting
customer_reviews.text: These are great and no real noise when using while doing deadlifts
customer_reviews.author: kevin ryan

customer_reviews.title: A good bumper plate and also the colors for the motivation ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. A good bumper plate and also the colors for the motivation of clients to move up to the next color.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my garage gym and priced better than anything ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable and affordable. Perfect for my garage gym and priced better than anything Rogue has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: robert tees

customer_reviews.title: Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: Great for starting a home gym.They may be a little scuffed but hey it's gym equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome weights, just like the ones I used in highschool
customer_reviews.author: Ritchie Muro

customer_reviews.title: this rubber gives off a Super Strong Oder
customer_reviews.text: Def. does it job as a security weight to hold down a pelican case that I dont want just walking off. However, this rubber gives off a Super Strong Oder,, and fills any room you put it in. I had to wrap it in plastic to trap the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: You only get a single plate
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention when ordering, you only receive a single plate. We ordered as a package with 10's,15's, and 25's which came as a pair. Only makes sense when using for lifting you receive two plates of equal weight. We sent 35 and 45 back, we found better pricing at rogue fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lee Lomonaco

customer_reviews.title: These work great and I love that the 10s are large (I ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great and I love that the 10s are large (I use them for warm up deadlifts, where the size of the plate matters more). Also the color is a nice change from standard black. I plan to buy other sizes soon.
customer_reviews.author: arp

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Same size as an oly plate. Makes my bar comfortable to use with light weights during a recovery period from an injury.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 45 lb plates would be useless..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two (2) 45 lb Rubber Plates in early November, 2015. To date (1/12/16) I have only received one 45 lb rubber plate. X Training Equipment, despite being contacted, has failed to respond to my concern (why would I want one 45 lb weight!!!.... in the same vein, why would I make this up....3 45 lb plates would be useless.... 2 is the correct number) and has not issued me a full refund for the item which I ordered, and paid for, but did not receive from X Training Equipment. 1 star for Customer Service. That said, the quality of the one (1) 45 lb plate is high/good - if the shipping/customer service was not horrid, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The holes for these weights are extremely large and do not fit a normal bar.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and fairly smooth fit on a new Olympic barbell.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid plates. They do what you would expect, be heavy and fit well on the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Opening too small
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine with the product except the fact that the opening was too tight to fit on a standard 2 inch barbell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: X Training Equipment Premium Color Bumper Plate Solid Rubber with Steel Insert - Great for Crosstraining Workouts
feature_bullets: Pro-grade: Trust the brand found in commercial gyms across the US. X Training olympic plates outperform the competition.

Solid Construction: Go ahead and PR that lift without worrying about your plates. Designed for low bounce and high durability, X Training bumper plates are constructed of 100% solid rubber to withstand punishment.
Fits Olympic Bars: X Training weight plates fit standard 2" olympic barbells.

Strong warranty: X Training guarantees our products shall be free material defects in workmanship and materials under normal use and conditions during the warranty period. 10lb and 15lb plates are covered for six months. 25lb, 35lb, and 45lb plates are covered for three years. The warranty does not cover ordinary wear and tear or cosmetic damage.
